articles.title: Duel events will starkly contrast Biden's and Trump's approaches to pandemic
articles.description: President-elect Joe Biden on Tuesday will introduce the scientists and doctors he says will finally defeat the pandemic -- but for now his team can only watch as a wave of infection and death deepens the crisis he will face after January 20.

articles.title: Trump's window for election subversion is closing
articles.description: President Donald Trump's legal team for weeks has worked to delay the certification of Joe Biden's election win in a long-shot effort to create an opening for Trump stay in power.
